metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43332 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In GNU Mailman before 2.1.36, the CSRF token for the Cgi/admindb.py admindb page contains an encrypted version of the list admin password. This could potentially be cracked by a moderator via an offline brute-force attack.

criterions.comment: mailman: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
